name: Movement Simulator 2018
description:
Movement Simulation 2018 is a Singleplayer,  Time attack and highscore 3D Simulation game for PC and VR Devices which targets for Casual Gamers who are looking for Simple, Fast Paced, Precision and Time Management, Children-Friendly content that takes place in a abandoned House where players are carrier which prepares house props for movement by putting them boxes and into the cargo truck in order to do that without breaking objects in given time.

Credits

Semih Bertuğ Benim - Gameplay Designer & Programmer

Berkkan Cansız - Level Designer

Zeynep Burcu Kâya - Level Designer & 3D Artist

Cansu Polat - 3D Artist

Mahmmoud A Trad - 3D Artist
